message:
We are planning to move to something easier where people can search our previous discussions and our shared links.
The Question here what kind of featured you are looking for in the new Egyptian Geeks Community?
we are thinking to use something like discourse.org or moot.it based on @Ahmad Abd-Elghanyï»¿ suggestions however you can suggest anything else by 
leaving it in a comment.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din created a poll in Egyptian Geeks.

data.message: The most important thing for me the easiness of sharing which fb provides. I still see that the fb group has a great advantage which is the notification and we are regularly visits fb which granted that we will view the group content

I went ahead and I created https://moot.it/egyptian-geeks
It certainly fits the paradigm I presume a lot would be comfortable with but it doesn't have any options to turn it into a private board or something of that sort. Question is, do we need this? I'm all for keeping it public
Amr Eldib It's even good to add them so we can plan ahead. I'm with you on not launching with all the features but it's really good to count for them :) thanks a lot buddy for your input :)
Hady Ahmed Yeah I support Amr's Opinion Now we are gathering Features in a couple of days we will make another Questionnaire for the platform so we can all be okay with the choice :)
Oh no one is rushing, I've had my eyes on moot for  along time so figured it's a nice opportunity to give it a spin. I'm in favour of discourse, moot is a lot more slimmer though.
one important reason why we shouldn't rush things is the headache of the migration :D i don't wanna be there when this happen :D
Please don't move, we are too lazy to visit pages other than Facebook nowadays

Tarek Amr Don't worry we will have both. just we want to keep a record of our bookmarks and most important questions and answers so they don't get repeated and we found out that we do really well in responding questions so we want the benefit to be for EVERYONE :-)

there are a bunch of reasons to think of migration, first facebook lack of indexing... or categorizing topics.. interests, the essential need for a bookmarks repository, creating a q&a section, job board... may be also a video repository (nice geeky hangouts). I think that move should be done to keep community healthy (getting red of bunch of spam marketing, spam messages too)
I think we can make the app post automatically in the facebook group. this way we can notify every body anything we do in our website.
